text:
This is to acknowledge your recent request to use material from one
of our publications. - “Richard Cory” by Edwin Arlington
Robinson.
Unfortunately, we do not hold the rights you seek; therefore your
letter has been forwarded to
Miss Ruth Nivison
Head Tide,
Maine
We suggest that future correspondence regarding the same material
be sent to the above address.
Sincerely yours,
Permissions Editor
CHARLES SCRIBNER'S SONS
597 Fifth Avenue, New York
